questions.question_text: Which is used to authenticate and encrypt traffic from individual applications on compliant devices to internal resources?

discussion.content:
https://techzone.vmware.com/resource/workspace-one-uem-architecture#vmware-tunnel
VMware Tunnel leverages unique certificates deployed from Workspace ONE UEM to authenticate and encrypt traffic from the mobile device to resources on the internal network.

Selected Answer: A
A is right

Selected Answer: BDE
Confirming BDE as per this document:
https://techzone.vmware.com/quick-start-tutorial-series-cloud-based-vmware-workspace-one#_1016928

questions.question_text: Which three options are supported by Workspace ONE Access? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
To customize the admin console's default branding in Workspace ONE, the administrator should:

A. Navigate to UEM Console, All Settings, System, Branding. Click Branding and edit the settings in the Branding page as appropriate.

This is the correct path and location for customizing the branding of the admin console in Workspace ONE. It allows you to customize the company logo, text color, and background to reflect your organization's branding preferences.

Selected Answer: A
A is right. Checked on the Admin Console itself. C&D of course not, "Admin Console's Branding" nothing to do with Hub Services.

questions.question_text:
An administrator would like to customize their admin consoles default branding to include the company logo and reflect the company's text color and background.
How would the administrator accomplish this task?

choices.A: Navigate to UEM Console, All Settings, System, Branding. Click Branding and edit the settings in the Branding page as appropriate.
choices.B: Navigate to the Configurations tab on the console. Click Branding. Edit the settings in the Branding page as appropriate.
choices.C: Navigate to the Hub Service console Home page. Click Branding. Edit the settings in the Branding page as appropriate.
choices.D: Navigate to UEM Console, All Settings, Hub Services. Click Branding and edit the settings in the Branding page as appropriate.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
The two statements that are true about Content Gateway and Tunnel on Unified Access Gateway are:

B. Both can be configured with the same hostname on different ports: You can configure Content Gateway and Tunnel to use the same hostname but on different ports. For example, you can have Content Gateway on port 8443 and Tunnel on a different port like 8444 or any other port you choose.

E. Both can be configured on port 443 with different hostnames: You can configure Content Gateway and Tunnel on the same port (e.g., port 443) but with different hostnames. This allows you to use different hostnames to access Content Gateway and Tunnel services while they share the same port.

These configurations provide flexibility in how you set up and access Content Gateway and Tunnel on Unified Access Gateway, allowing you to tailor them to your specific requirements.

Content Gateway only supports inbound 443 because that is what iOS or Android use. The tunnel is more flexible.
https://techzone.vmware.com/configuring-edge-services-vmware-unified-access-gateway-vmware-workspace-one-operational-tutorial#architecture

- B on 100% 
But both serice we can configre on 443 and 8443

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about Content Gateway and Tunnel on Unified Access Gateway? (Choose two.)

choices.E: Both can be configured on port 443 with different hostnames.
choices.C: Both can be configured on port 8443 with different hostnames.
choices.D: Both can be configured with the same hostname on port 443.
choices.B: Both can be configured with the same hostname on different ports.
choices.A: Both can be configured with the same hostname on port 8443.

choices.C: The concerned device will be unenrolled.
choices.D: After 2 days, all managed apps will be blocked/removed from the concerned device.
choices.B: The concerned device will be marked as Non-compliant immediately.
choices.A: After 1 day, end user will receive the push notification.
